text: James Christopher Read (born July 31, 1953) is an American actor. He acted in many movies and television series. He is best known for the North and South miniseries (1985, 1986, 1994). He was born in Buffalo, New York. == Filmography == The following is some of the movies and television programms Read has been in. Year Title role 1983 Blue Thunder Policeman 1983 Remington Steele Murphy Michaels 1984 The Initiation Peter 1985 North and South, Book I George Hazard 1985 Midas Valley Josh Landau 1985 Lace II Daryl Webster 1985 Robert Kennedy & His Times Teddy Kennedy 1986 North and South, Book II George Hazard 1987 Poor Little Rich Girl: The Barbara Hutton Story Cary Grant 1987 Celebration Family James Marston 1987 Shell Game Riley/John Reid 1988 Beaches Michael Essex 1988 Eight Men Out Claude "Lefty" Williams 1990 Web of Deceit Paul Evanston 1990 Columbo: Uneasy Lies the Crown Dr. Wesley Corman 1990 Lola (TV pilot) Peter Baltic 1992 The President's Child Senator James Guthrie 1992 Love Crimes Stanton Gray 1994 North and South, Book III George Hazard 1995 When the Dark Man Calls Det.
